abstract: Google Ventures and Khosla Ventures invest in a start-up that insures farmers against extreme weather that can cripple crop production.
snippet: Google Ventures and Khosla Ventures invest in a start-up that insures farmers against extreme weather that can cripple crop production.
lead_paragraph: Google Ventures and Khosla Ventures have led a $42 million financing round in WeatherBill, a San Francisco start-up that insures farmers against extreme weather conditions that can cripple crop production.

abstract: A coalition of retailers and clothing makers, including Wal-Mart, is planning to issue sustainability scores that the industry, and eventually shoppers, will use.
snippet: A coalition of retailers and clothing makers, including Wal-Mart, is planning to issue sustainability scores that the industry, and eventually shoppers, will use.
lead_paragraph: With just a few clicks on Google Maps, anyone can call up a satellite image of blue dye and other chemicals washing downriver from textile mills in Xintang, China  the world capital of blue jeans production.

headline.main: Clothes Makers Join to Set ‘Green Score’
headline.print_headline: Clothes Makers Join To Set ‘Green Score’
